name: A New Tab Modification
description:
Fx 13.0a1 and later:
Just some new-tab modifications (with much larger thumbnails than the default).
For 1440x900 resolutions, however, <strike>and requires a refresh after dragging or rearranging thumbnails.</strike>
Thanks to user 61655, the dragging and rearranging now works.
Should work on Fx 12+.
additional_info:
08.21.2012: Edited to work with the new prefs introduced today in Fx 17.0a1 (the Nightly) ... browser.newtabpage.columns and browser.newtabpage.rows. Set those to your liking in about:config. Great addition by Mozilla! :)

07.28.2012: Removed the #launcher that crept in from the Start Page - I guess Mozilla isn't as worried about redundancies all that much ...

06.27.2012: Minor edit for the control appearances in the thumbnails. Much better, thanks to user 136304. :)

06.21.2012: Updated the background url. Thanks, user 136304! :)

Note: this style is specific to 1440x900 screen resolutions, as far as I know, since that's all I have for testing.

Updated to allow dragging and rearranging of thumbnails without requiring a page refresh. Thanks to user 61655 for creating the solution.

Updated per instructions from user 61655 (thanks!) : style 61060 for compatibility with the latest Fx Nightly (now 15.0a1).

Special thanks to user 61655 : style 61060 for all his help as well as user 133826 : style 61081 ...

discussions.name: Fx 13+ drag & drop rearranging thumbnails style fix....
